page.title: 02HOCKLEY NEXT TO RAYLEIGH
page.content: Hockley is next to Rayleigh and Hawkwell. In Hockley there is a mixture of new and old housing, it has quiet and noisey roads. There are quite a few places to shop, including banks, supermarkets, butchers and takeaways. Hockley has a new school that was built in 1983, it has several pubs,one library, one fire station and a railway station. Hockley is a hilly place it has a wood with walks and swings for the children. Some people say Hockley is a friendly place and people like to walk in the nearby fields, especially when the corn is ripe. Hockley has an attractive church, called St. Peters and St. Pauls. We enjoy living in Hockley because people are very neighbourly.
